name: clarnote
description: AI-powered meeting assistant with transcription, summaries, and action items

scripts.build:mobile: BUILD_MODE=mobile prisma generate && BUILD_MODE=mobile next build && npx cap sync
scripts.dev:ios: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run ios
scripts.dev:android: npm run build:mobile && npx cap run android
scripts.build:prod:ios: npm run build:mobile && cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace App.xcworkspace -scheme App -configuration Release -destination generic/platform=iOS -archivePath ./build/App.xcarchive archive
scripts.build:prod:android: npm run build:mobile && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.build:testflight: npm run build:prod:ios && cd ios && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath ./build/App.xcarchive -exportPath ./build/ -exportOptionsPlist ./App/exportOptions.plist
scripts.build:internal-testing: npm run build:prod:android && echo 'APK ready for Android Internal Testing at: android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk'

author: Clarnote Team
